function.name: EQUALS
function.description: Compares if both arguments are equal.

argument.name: target-var
argument.description: In which variable should be function answer saved?

function.name: GREATER_THAN
function.description: Compares if first argument is greater than second.

argument.name: target-var
argument.description: In which variable should be function answer saved?

function.name: LOWER_THAN
function.description: Compares if first argument is lower than second.

argument.name: target-var
argument.description: In which variable should be function answer saved?

function.name: VARIABLE_SAVE
function.description: Writes given value to target variable.

argument.name: target-var
argument.description: In which variable should be function answer saved?

function.name: NUMBER_EDIT
function.description:
Writes given value to target variable. SUPPORTS NUMBER ONLY!
Value syntax examples: "+5" //Adds 5 to current value "-$MwH" //Removes number value of global variable MwH "*1" //Multiplies by 1 "/0.5" //Divides by 0.5

argument.name: target-var
argument.description: In which variable should be function answer saved?
